text: (Napiye!) Innum umakku munnar nam anuppiya tutarkalellam niccayamaka unavaruntupavarkalakavum, katai vitikalil natamatupavarkalakavumtam iruntarkal; melum, nam unkalil cilarai marrum cilarukkuc cotanaiyakki irukkirom - akave ninkal porumaiyutan iruppirkala? Um'mutaiya iraivan (yavarraiyum) urru nokkiyavanakave irukkinran
